title: app/smsProviders
description: Templates (available at Administration > Templates). Usually used for system emails.

additionalProperties.description: A template name. Should start with the lower case letter.

scopeList.description: A list of scopes (entity types) for which the template is available.

scope.description: A scope (entity types) for which the template is available. Use it if it's needed only for one entity type.

scopeListConfigParam.description: A config parameter defining for which entity types the template is available.
